items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by a user, all other team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are synchronized across web and mobile platforms without requiring a manual refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds.
Support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation.

items.title: Shared Task Boards
items.description: Provide a shared visual board for teams to organize and track tasks collaboratively.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create, edit, and delete tasks on a shared board.
Changes made by one user are visible to all team members in real-time.
non_functional: Board interface must load within 3 seconds.
Support drag-and-drop functionality for task cards.

notes: Assumed core features include real-time updates and shared boards as part of team collaboration. Further requirements such as chat, notifications, or permissions are not specified.
